snippet: Shares in the unit of the state-owned Citic Group soared on news of the deal, which would help Citic Telecom expand its business in Greater China and signal an exit from the region for Britain's Cable & Wireless Communications.
abstract: Shares in the unit of the state-owned Citic Group soared on news of the deal, which would help Citic Telecom expand its business in Greater China and signal an exit from the region for Britain's Cable & Wireless Communications.

headline.main: China's Citic Telecom in $1.2 Billion Deal for Macau Phone Company
